title: 2BR 1Bath apartment with parking, walk to all 9/1 NO FEE
posting_body: ['For rent by owner, no broker fees', 'Available September 1st in the heart of Island Park, on Parma rd with easy access to everything.', 'Walk to the train station, places of worship, shops and restaurants on Long Beach Road, library, etc. .', 'The apartment consists of Living room, dining room, kitchen, bathroom and two bedrooms.', 'It is on the first floor of a two family home.', 'Comes with a deck and a long driveway that can fit a few cars and a garage for storage.', 'Shared use with upstairs tenant of large backyard.', 'No pets or smoking.', 'Good credit and employment check required.', '$2800/month, 1 month security, 1 year lease.', 'Open house 8/6 from 12pm to 2pm.', 'Email for address.', 'No realtors please']
